import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import '../../css/about.css'; const About = (props) => { useEffect(() => { props.setShowFooter(true); document.title = "SHAREHOME - How to play"; }); return (

How to play?

SHAREHOME is a very flexible party game with multiple ways of playing.

Roleplay

Play as strangers living together in the same house whose daily interactions and drama are commentated on by the other players.

Charades

Assign the designated players a random Member Card and act out your favorite scenes, the others try to guess who they are.

Guess who?

Every player is given a random Member Card and takes turns to guess who they are. You are only allowed to ask yes / no questions.

Taboo

Taboo

Split into teams and take turns with the deck of Member Cards. Get your teammates to guess each character without using any of the forbidden words.

...and many more!

How will you play SHAREHOME?

Click here to view the full rulebook PDF.

); } export default About;
